gmail.categoryPrimary.description: Displayed when viewing emails in the primary category.

gmail.categoryUpdates.description: Displayed when viewing emails in the updates category.

gmail.categoryForum.description: Displayed when viewing emails in the forums category.

gmail.inLabel.description: Displayed when a user is browsing emails in a certain label. The name of the label will appear below.
